node.excerpt: Without creative leaders there is little hope for new innovative solutions to the world's problems. This speech is inspired by the excellent…
node.html: Without creative leaders there is little hope for new innovative solutions to the world's problems. This speech is inspired by the excellent Creative Calling book by Chase Jarvis, insights from Reid Hoffman's Masters of Scale podcast and Satya Nadella's book Hit Refresh.

frontmatter.title: The Impact of Wheat on Our Health

node.excerpt: Fascinating insights from the Wheat Belly book by cardiologist Dr William Davis and Farmer's Footprint by Dr Zach Bush into how wheat has…
node.html: Fascinating insights from the Wheat Belly book by cardiologist Dr William Davis and Farmer's Footprint by Dr Zach Bush into how wheat has changed over the years and the health issues caused by modern wheat.

node.excerpt: Insights from three excellent books that inspired me to change the way I eat. The Longevity Diet by Dr Valter Longo,  The Mindspan Diet by…
node.html: Insights from three excellent books that inspired me to change the way I eat. The Longevity Diet by Dr Valter Longo, The Mindspan Diet by Dr Preston Estep and Finding Ultra by Rich Roll.

node.excerpt: This is my first Toastmasters speech and inspired by Dan Roam's excellent book Draw to Win.
node.html: This is my first Toastmasters speech and inspired by Dan Roam's excellent book Draw to Win.
